name: df-log
body: |- wceq(clog, ccnv(cres(ce, cima(ccnv(cim), co(cneg(cpi), cioc, cpi)))))
comment: Define the natural logarithm function on complex numbers. It is defined as the principal value, that is, the inverse of the exponential whose imaginary part lies in the interval (-pi, pi]. See ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Natural_logarithm and ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Complex_logarithm . (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Apr-2008.)
